availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathaniel Franklin Conway (Mason County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Nicholas County, Kentucky native. Married to Amanda T. Jennings Conway on April 7, 1857. Father of Will F. Conway, Bettie G. Conway, and Charles Lee Conway. Farmer in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Charles Kerr, ed. History of Kentucky (Chicago: American Historical Society, 1922), 4:301. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 67.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Mason County Marriages, p. unknown.
Find A Grave, “Nathaniel Franklin ‘Frank’ Conway (November 11, 1831-May 30, 2015), "Memorial #147201852, http://findagrave.com/memorial/147201852 (accessed February 8, 2018).
